Uses of Interface
javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIServer

Packages that use RMIServer
javax.management.remote.rmi The RMI connector is a connector for the JMX Remote API that uses RMI to transmit client requests to a remote MBean server. 
 

Uses of RMIServer in javax.management.remote.rmi
 

Classes in javax.management.remote.rmi that implement RMIServer
 class RMIIIOPServerImpl
          An RMIServerImpl that is exported through IIOP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through IIOP.
 class RMIJRMPServerImpl
          An RMIServer object that is exported through JRMP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through JRMP.
 class RMIServerImpl
          An RMI object representing a connector server.
 class RMIServerImpl_Stub
           
 

Constructors in javax.management.remote.rmi with parameters of type RMIServer
RMIConnector(RMIServer rmiServer, Map<String,?> environment)
          Constructs an RMIConnector using the given RMI stub.
